languages.text: "Вынужден отказать. Наша миссия и приказ маршала имеют высший приоритет, даже перед просьбой такой важной особы, как вы".
"I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."
languages.original_text: "Вынужден отказать. Наша миссия и приказ маршала имеют высший приоритет, даже перед просьбой такой важной особы, как вы".

traits.locale_text: "I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."
"I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."
"I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."
"I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."
"I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."
"I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."

languages.text: "Bedauere. Unsere Mission und die Befehle des Marschalls haben Priorität. Das gilt auch für Anfragen hochgestellter Persönlichkeiten wie Euch.
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."

traits.locale_text: "Bedauere. Unsere Mission und die Befehle des Marschalls haben Priorität. Das gilt auch für Anfragen hochgestellter Persönlichkeiten wie Euch.

languages.text: « Je me vois dans l'obligation de refuser. Notre mission et les ordres du maréchal sont prioritaires. Même la demande d'une personne aussi influente que vous ne saurait nous en détourner. »
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."

traits.locale_text: « Je me vois dans l'obligation de refuser. Notre mission et les ordres du maréchal sont prioritaires. Même la demande d'une personne aussi influente que vous ne saurait nous en détourner. »

languages.text: «Debo declinar su oferta. Nuestra misión y las órdenes del mariscal tienen prioridad, incluso por encima de la petición de una persona tan ilustre como usted».
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."

traits.locale_text: «Debo declinar su oferta. Nuestra misión y las órdenes del mariscal tienen prioridad, incluso por encima de la petición de una persona tan ilustre como usted».

languages.text: “恐怕我只能拒绝。我们必须优先处理当下的任务，执行元帅的命令。即便是你这样位高权重的人下令，我们也只能回绝。”
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕我只能拒绝。我们必须优先处理当下的任务，执行元帅的命令。即便是你这样位高权重的人下令，我们也只能回绝。”

languages.text: 「お断りします。たとえ、あなたのような強大な権限を持つ方の要請であっても、私たちの任務と将帥の命令は最優先です」
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."

traits.locale_text: 「お断りします。たとえ、あなたのような強大な権限を持つ方の要請であっても、私たちの任務と将帥の命令は最優先です」

languages.text: "Reddetmek zorundayım. Vazifem ve Miralay'ın emirlerinin önceliği, sizin kadar kudret sahibi birinden gelen bir talebi bile kabul etmeme engel oluyor."
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."

traits.locale_text: "Reddetmek zorundayım. Vazifem ve Miralay'ın emirlerinin önceliği, sizin kadar kudret sahibi birinden gelen bir talebi bile kabul etmeme engel oluyor."

languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Our mission and the Marshal's orders take priority, even over a request from an individual as empowered as you."
